mapper.select: SELECT P.PAPER_ID paperId, P.PAPER_COURSE_ID paperCourseId, C.COURSE_NAME paperCourseName, P.PAPER_NAME paperName, P.PAPER_TEST_TIME paperTestTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_QUESTION_PAPER QP WHERE P.PAPER_ID = QP.PAPER_ID) paperQuestionAmount, P.PAPER_STATE paperState, P.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, U.USERNAME createUserName, P.CREATE_TIME createTime, C.COURSE_TEACHER_ID paperCourseTeacherId, U2.USERNAME paperCourseTeacherName FROM T_PAPER P LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON P.CREATE_USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T_COURSE C ON P.PAPER_COURSE_ID = C.COURSE_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER U2 ON C.COURSE_TEACHER_ID = U2.USER_ID WHERE P.PAPER_ID = #{paperId}
mapper.sql: SELECT P.PAPER_ID paperId, P.PAPER_COURSE_ID paperCourseId, P.PAPER_NAME paperName, P.PAPER_TEST_TIME paperTestTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_QUESTION_PAPER QP WHERE P.PAPER_ID = QP.PAPER_ID) paperQuestionAmount, P.PAPER_STATE paperState, P.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, P.CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_PAPER P LEFT JOIN T_QUESTION_PAPER QP ON P.PAPER_ID = QP.PAPER_ID WHERE QP.QUESTION_ID = #{questionId}

SELECT DISTINCT P.PAPER_ID paperId, P.PAPER_COURSE_ID paperCourseId, C.COURSE_NAME paperCourseName, P.PAPER_NAME paperName, P.PAPER_TEST_TIME paperTestTime, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_QUESTION_PAPER QP WHERE P.PAPER_ID = QP.PAPER_ID) paperQuestionAmount, P.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, U3.USERNAME createUserName, P.CREATE_TIME createTime, C.COURSE_TEACHER_ID paperCourseTeacherId, U2.USERNAME paperCourseTeacherName FROM T_PAPER P JOIN T_TIMETABLE T ON P.PAPER_COURSE_ID = T.TIMETABLE_COURSE_ID JOIN T_USER U ON U.DEPT_ID = T.TIMETABLE_CLASS_ID JOIN T_COURSE C ON P.PAPER_COURSE_ID = C.COURSE_ID JOIN T_USER U2 ON C.COURSE_TEACHER_ID = U2.USER_ID JOIN T_USER U3 ON P.CREATE_USER_ID = U3.USER_ID WHERE P.PAPER_STATE = '2'
AND U.USER_ID = #{userId} AND P.PAPER_ID NOT IN (SELECT TR.RESULT_PAPER_ID FROM T_TEST_RESULT TR WHERE TR.RESULT_USER_ID = #{userId})
